title: Among the Shadows: 13 Stories of Darkness & Light
description: Even the lightest hearts have shaded corners to hide the black thoughts that come at night. Experience the darker side of YA as 13 authors explore the places that others prefer to leave among the shadows.The eyes have it--Gretchen McNeil--The one true Miranda Lieu--Kate Karyus Quinn--Such a lovely monster--Justina Ireland--Heroin(e)--Kelly Fiore--Canary--Demitria Lunetta--Phantom heart--Mindy McGinnis--Reunion--Joelle Charbonneau--Not fade away--Geoffrey Girard--Blarach bridge--Lydia Kang--Chasing the sky--R.C. Lewis--The cowbird egg--Phoebe North--Panic room--Lenore Appelhans--Lonely hunter--Beth Revis--Author Q & As--Acknowledgments
author: Kate Karyus Quinn
